google-docs.description: Google Docs MCP server for creating, editing, and managing Google Docs documents, including tables, images, headers, footers, and formatting via natural language.

tools.name: GOOGLEDOCS_CREATE_DOCUMENT
tools.description: Create Document. Creates a new Google Docs document using the provided title and, if non-empty, inserts the supplied text at the start of the body.

parameters.title: string - Name of the document (required)
parameters.text: string - Initial body text (required; can be empty string)

tools.name: GOOGLEDOCS_COPY_DOCUMENT
tools.description: Copy Document. Duplicates an existing Google Docs file using the Drive API. Useful for templating.

tools.name: GOOGLEDOCS_CREATE_DOCUMENT_MARKDOWN
tools.description: Create Document (Markdown). Converts provided markdown to formatted Google Docs content (basic headers, bold, italic, paragraphs) and creates a new document.

parameters.title: string - Document title (required)
parameters.markdown_text: string - Markdown content to convert and insert (required)

tools.name: GOOGLEDOCS_GET_DOCUMENT_BY_ID
tools.description: Get Document by ID. Fetches an existing Google Docs document by its ID; returns 404-style error information if not found.

tools.name: GOOGLEDOCS_SEARCH_DOCUMENTS
tools.description: Search Documents. Searches Google Drive for Google Docs using filters like name, date ranges, sharing, starred, and more.

tools.name: GOOGLEDOCS_CREATE_HEADER
tools.description: Create Header. Adds a header to the document (DEFAULT or FIRST_PAGE). If FIRST_PAGE is requested, the tool enables first-page headers automatically.

tools.name: GOOGLEDOCS_CREATE_FOOTER
tools.description: Create Footer. Tool to create a new footer in a Google document. Use when you need to add a footer, optionally specifying its type and the section it applies to.

tools.name: GOOGLEDOCS_DELETE_HEADER
tools.description: Delete Header. Deletes the header from the specified section or the default header if no section is specified.

tools.name: GOOGLEDOCS_DELETE_FOOTER
tools.description: Delete Footer. Tool to delete a footer from a Google document. Use when you need to remove a footer from a specific section or the default footer.

tools.name: GOOGLEDOCS_CREATE_FOOTNOTE
tools.description: Create Footnote. Inserts a footnote reference at a specific index or at an end-of-segment location; automatically clamps out-of-range indices to a valid position.

tools.name: GOOGLEDOCS_INSERT_TEXT_ACTION
tools.description: Insert Text into Document. Tool to insert a string of text at a specified location within a Google document.

parameters.insertion_index: number - Index where to insert text (required)

tools.name: GOOGLEDOCS_DELETE_CONTENT_RANGE
tools.description: Delete Content Range in Document. Tool to delete a range of content from a Google document.

parameters.range: object - Range object with startIndex and endIndex (required)

tools.name: GOOGLEDOCS_REPLACE_ALL_TEXT
tools.description: Replace All Text in Document. Replaces all occurrences of a string with another across the document.

tools.name: GOOGLEDOCS_UPDATE_DOCUMENT_MARKDOWN
tools.description: Update Document Markdown. Replaces the entire content of an existing Google Docs document with new markdown text.

tools.name: GOOGLEDOCS_UPDATE_DOCUMENT_STYLE
tools.description: Update Document Style. Tool to update the overall document style, such as page size, margins, and default text direction.

parameters.fields: string - Fields mask for properties to update (required)

tools.name: GOOGLEDOCS_UPDATE_EXISTING_DOCUMENT
tools.description: Update existing document. Applies programmatic edits, such as text insertion, deletion, or formatting, to a specified Google Doc using the batchupdate API method.

parameters.editDocs: array - Array of raw Docs API request objects (required)

tools.name: GOOGLEDOCS_INSERT_INLINE_IMAGE
tools.description: Insert Inline Image. Inserts an image from a publicly accessible https URL at a given document index; optionally sets size in points.

tools.name: GOOGLEDOCS_REPLACE_IMAGE
tools.description: Replace Image in Document. Replaces a specific image with a new image from a URI.

tools.name: GOOGLEDOCS_INSERT_PAGE_BREAK
tools.description: Insert Page Break. Inserts a page break at a given location or at the end of a segment.

parameters.insertPageBreak: object - The request object as per Docs API (required)

tools.name: GOOGLEDOCS_CREATE_PARAGRAPH_BULLETS
tools.description: Create Paragraph Bullets. Applies bullet formatting to paragraphs fully or partially covered by the provided text range.

tools.name: GOOGLEDOCS_DELETE_PARAGRAPH_BULLETS
tools.description: Delete Paragraph Bullets. Tool to remove bullets from paragraphs within a specified range in a Google document.

parameters.range: object - Range object with startIndex and endIndex (required)

tools.name: GOOGLEDOCS_CREATE_NAMED_RANGE
tools.description: Create Named Range. Defines a named range over a start/end index span; indices are validated against the document length and clamped if needed.

tools.name: GOOGLEDOCS_DELETE_NAMED_RANGE
tools.description: Delete Named Range. Tool to delete a named range from a Google document. Use when you need to remove a previously defined named range by its id or name.

parameters.deleteNamedRange: object - Delete named range request object (required)

tools.name: GOOGLEDOCS_INSERT_TABLE_ACTION
tools.description: Insert Table in Google Doc. Adds a table at a specific index or end of a segment (body/header/footer).

parameters.index: number (optional) - Text index to insert at
parameters.insertAtEndOfSegment: boolean (optional) - If true, ignore index and insert at end of segment
parameters.segmentId: string (optional) - Segment to target when inserting at end

tools.name: GOOGLEDOCS_INSERT_TABLE_COLUMN
tools.description: Insert Table Column. Adds a column to an existing table using raw Docs API requests.

parameters.requests: array - Array of Docs API request objects (required)

tools.name: GOOGLEDOCS_DELETE_TABLE
tools.description: Delete Table. Tool to delete an entire table from a Google document.

tools.name: GOOGLEDOCS_DELETE_TABLE_COLUMN
tools.description: Delete Table Column. Tool to delete a column from a table in a Google document.

parameters.requests: array - Array of deleteTableColumn request objects (required)

tools.name: GOOGLEDOCS_DELETE_TABLE_ROW
tools.description: Delete Table Row. Tool to delete a row from a table in a Google document.

tools.name: GOOGLEDOCS_UNMERGE_TABLE_CELLS
tools.description: Unmerge Table Cells. Tool to unmerge previously merged cells in a table.

tools.name: GOOGLEDOCS_UPDATE_TABLE_ROW_STYLE
tools.description: Update Table Row Style. Tool to update the style of a table row in a Google document.

tools.name: GOOGLEDOCS_GET_CHARTS_FROM_SPREADSHEET
tools.description: Get Charts from Spreadsheet. Retrieves all embedded charts across sheets in a spreadsheet and returns each chart's ID and spec.

tools.name: GOOGLEDOCS_LIST_SPREADSHEET_CHARTS_ACTION
tools.description: List Charts from Spreadsheet. Retrieves chart ids and metadata from a Google Sheets spreadsheet for embedding into Google Docs.
